roleset.name: turn organic waste into enviornmentally friendly goo
roleset.note: COMPOST-V NOTES: frame created by Claire (from compost.01-v)

example.name: infinitive
example.text: We've bought two rubbish recycling boxes from the municipal government, which we-3 use *-3 to compost each day's fruit and vegetable scraps.
example.arg: each day's fruit and vegetable scraps
